<title level="1" right="Spell 6" pfs="Standard">[Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 371 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Psychopomp](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=13)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

You concentrate ethereal energy and attack a creature's spirit, dealing 16d6 force damage. Because _spirit blast_ affects the creature's spirit, it can damage a target projecting its consciousness (such as via [_project image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=237)) or possessing another creature even if the target's body is elsewhere. The possessed creature isn't harmed by the blast. The blast doesn't harm creatures that have no spirit, such as constructs.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Spirit Blast
